data.title: Why Tom Lee's BitMine buys over $265 million in Ethereum amid crypto market crash – can ETH recover after price slump?
data.description: Ethereum price today: BitMine has purchased over $265 million in Ethereum despite a significant market downturn, raising questions about the future of ETH and the crypto market. Can Ethereum recover after its recent price slump?
data.keywords: Ethereum price, BitMine Immersion, crypto market crash, Tom Lee, Bitcoin price
